All Ways Natural Shampoo - Imported (355 ml) Price: Rs.2400

ALL WAYS Natural Shampoo Moisturizing Formula Restores Natural Luster Body & Shine 12oz/355ml.All Ways Natural Shampoo made with our exclusive moisturizing formula is a blend of nature s finest herbs and oils to replenish your hair s natural moisture. Our mild formula gently cleanses without stripping your hair of its natural oils leaving it healthy and full of body. Regular use of All Ways Natural Shampoo will leave your hair with a beautiful healthy shine that s all yours.
